languages.text: [Напасть] "Люди! Этот лжец служит ксеносам! Он обманывал вас, к оружию!"
[Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"
languages.original_text: [Напасть] "Люди! Этот лжец служит ксеносам! Он обманывал вас, к оружию!"

traits.locale_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"
[Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"
[Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"
[Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"
[Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

languages.text: [攻击]“各位，听我说！这个骗子在为异形做事！他骗了你们！举起武器！”
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: [攻击]“各位，听我说！这个骗子在为异形做事！他骗了你们！举起武器！”

languages.text: ［攻撃する］「皆の者、聞け！この嘘つきは異種族の犬だ！お前たちは騙されている！武器を手に取り、立ち上がれ！」
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: ［攻撃する］「皆の者、聞け！この嘘つきは異種族の犬だ！お前たちは騙されている！武器を手に取り、立ち上がれ！」

languages.text: [Atacar] «¡Escuchadme, camaradas! ¡Este mentiroso sirve a los xenos! ¡Os ha engañado a todos! ¡A las armas!».
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: [Atacar] «¡Escuchadme, camaradas! ¡Este mentiroso sirve a los xenos! ¡Os ha engañado a todos! ¡A las armas!».

languages.text: [Attaquer] « Écoutez-moi tous ! Ce menteur est au service des xénos ! Il s'est joué de vous ! Aux armes ! »
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer] « Écoutez-moi tous ! Ce menteur est au service des xénos ! Il s'est joué de vous ! Aux armes ! »

languages.text: [Angreifen] "Hört her, Leute! Dieser Lügner dient den Xenos! Ihr wurdet getäuscht! Zu den Waffen!"
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: [Angreifen] "Hört her, Leute! Dieser Lügner dient den Xenos! Ihr wurdet getäuscht! Zu den Waffen!"

languages.text: [Saldır] "Herkes beni dinlesin! Bu yalancı, zenolara hizmet ediyor! Hepiniz kandırıldınız! Çekin silahlarınızı!"
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Hear me, people! This liar serves the xenos! You have been deceived! To arms!"

traits.locale_text: [Saldır] "Herkes beni dinlesin! Bu yalancı, zenolara hizmet ediyor! Hepiniz kandırıldınız! Çekin silahlarınızı!"
